title: Savannah-Chatham police investigate teen shot at Ogeechee Farms
content:
Savannah-Chatham police are investigating a shooting that injured a 17-year-old early Thursday morning.
Officers responded to St. Joseph’s/Candler Hopsital about 3 a.m. for a reported shooting that took place at Ogeechee Farms, said Darnisha Green, Savannah-Chatham police spokeswoman.
The victim arrived in a privately-owned vehicle seeking care for a non-life threatening gunshot wound, Green said.
Reportedly, he and some acquaintances were displaying firearms with each other. Shortly after, he was walking down an unknown street when he was shot, Green said.
Detectives did not locate a crime scene.
This incident remains under investigation.
